question:
Akbar deputed which of the following to suppress the rebellion of the Roshanais who forced the Roshanais to submit?
1. Raja Todar MalÂ 
2. Raja Man Singh
3. Khan-i-Khanan
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Akbar deputed Raja Todar Mal and Raja Man Singh to suppress the rebellion of Roshanais who forced the Roshanais to submit. Roshanai was a sect which was established by a soldier called Pir Roshanai.
